searchList.name: Rarity
searchList.description: Tracks rare drops, including companions and mounts

searchList.name: eSaith Bag Filter
searchList.description: Allows filtering of bag items to sell to vendor by rarity, current session instance/zones, and ilvl.

searchList.name: Scrolling Loot Text
searchList.description: Display loot in Blizzards Scrolling Combat Text with the Icon and the Name in the colour of the Rarity.
